result.execSummary:
The defendant Robin L Minette was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Battery, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 940.19(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Robin L Minette

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: 8:32  Defendant Robin L Minette in court with attorney Lars Helmer Loberg.  Rory Eoin O'Sullivan appeared for the State of Wisconsin. OSullivan - Plead to Ct 1  5days jail Credit for 2 days. Begin today.   Plea Questionnaire and Waiver of Rights form is filed with the court; court reviews with Def   Constitutional rights explained to defendant  Exam'd re: understanding of law, penalty and rights   DEF PLEADS GUILTY to Ct 1  Facts are correct  COURT ACCEPTS PLEA, FINDS DEF FREELY, INTELLIGENTLY, KNOWINGLY & UNDERSTANDINGLY MADE AND WAIVES CONSTITUTIONAL RIGHTS  The court finds the defendant guilty and adjudicates defendant guiltyof Ct 1 Court orders - 5 days jail to begin immediately  credit for  2 days served.
from the State of Minnesota, County of Mower. Service of subpoena on JH.

9:24  Defendant Robin L Minette in court by telephone with attorney Lars Helmer Loberg.  Rory Eoin O'Sullivan appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Court approves the defendant's appearance by telephone. The State agrees to the telephone testimony.  Atty OSullivan addresses the court. Court will take the motion up on the day of trial regarding the tesitmony of the witness ( appearance or non-appearance.) Case will remain on the calendar for Sept 3 at 8:30 for hearing but will be off for a jury at this time.

ADDRESS INFO for Robin L Minette
Current: 1304 9th Avenue NW, Austin, MN 55912 United States  (Effective: 07-01-2015)
Prior: 902 West Maple Street, River Falls, WI 54022
from Atty Loberg re: in compliance with Criminal Jury Trial Scheduling Order paragraph six.

Jury trial at 09-03-2015 08:30 am.
Final pre-trial at 08-10-2015 09:00 am.

3:37 p.m.  Defendant Robin L Minette in court with attorney Lars Helmer Loberg. Rory O'Sullivan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  O'Sullivan addresses the court.  Loberg addresses the court.  Court addresses the attorneys.  Court - set matter for trial in July.

3:05  Defendant Robin L Minette appears from the PC Jail via video conf in court with attorney Liesl E. Nelson.  Defendant Robin L Minette in custody.  Rory Eoin O'Sullivan appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Defendant has copy of complaint  Defendant waives reading of the complaint  Constitutional rights explained to defendant  Exam'd re: understanding of law, penalty and rights  DEF PLEADS NOT GUILTY  Pre-trial conference scheduled for May 5, 2015 at 02:45 pm.
